name: GRID 2 Reloaded
description:
Be fast, be first and be famous in GRID 2 Reloaded, featuring the full GRID 2 game expanded with over $50 worth of additional content including two new circuits – legendary Spa and fearsome Bathurst - and 25 extra cars, playable in split-screen, online and career mode. Experience aggressive wheel-to-wheel competition, advanced AI, stunning visuals and jaw-dropping damage in a new word of evolving motorsport.

1-2 Players
Network 2-12 Players
DUALSHOCK®3

This item is being licensed or sublicensed to you by Sony Computer Entertainment America and is subject to the Network Terms of Service and User Agreement, this item’s use restrictions and other applicable terms located at www.us.playstation.com/support/useragreements. If you do not wish to accept all these terms, do not download this item. This item may be used with up to 2 activated PlayStation®3 systems associated with this Sony Entertainment Network account.
